price: Ó ṣeé ṣe, tí ó bá kọ̀ yín sílẹ̀, kí Olúwa rẹ̀ fi àwọn obìnrin kan, tí wọn lóore jù yín lọ rọ́pò fún un, (tí wọ́n máa jẹ́) mùsùlùmí, onígbàgbọ́ òdodo, olùtẹ̀lé-àṣẹ, olùronúpìwàdà, olùjọ́sìn, olùgbààwẹ̀ (tí wọ́n máa jẹ́) adélébọ̀ àti wúńdíá.
arabic: عَسَىٰ رَبُّهُۥٓ إِن طَلَّقَكُنَّ أَن يُبۡدِلَهُۥٓ أَزۡوَٰجًا خَيۡرٗا مِّنكُنَّ مُسۡلِمَٰتٖ مُّؤۡمِنَٰتٖ قَٰنِتَٰتٖ تَٰٓئِبَٰتٍ عَٰبِدَٰتٖ سَٰٓئِحَٰتٖ ثَيِّبَٰتٖ وَأَبۡكَارٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: ʿasā rabbuhu in ṭallaqakunna an yub'dilahu azwājan khayran minkunna mus'limātin mu'minātin qānitātin tāibātin ʿābidātin sāiḥātin thayyibātin wa-abkāran
